title: Boyd Cycling Prologue Series takes off with new affordable MTB & Road alloy wheelsets
content:
Boyd Cyclingâ€™s budget-friendly Prologue Series wheelsets just got even friendlier. In addition to its 28 and 44 mm carbon rim and disc Prologue wheelsets that launched in 2020, Boyd has expanded with two new alloy models it hopes will bridge the gap between price tag and performance. The new models include the road Rouler Alloy

author: Mark Wilson
